title: Remove start screen text inputs and fix player name to Priyanshi

requirements.text: Remove the start (home) screen personalization text input UI and make the displayed player name always be the fixed value "Priyanshi" with no user input required.

quotes: All thing good just remove the home text box and name is Priyanshi fixed no input needed and rest game is good

acceptanceCriteria: On the start/home screen, there are no visible input controls for entering a name or other personalization text.
The start/home screen heading always greets the user as "Priyanshi" (i.e., it does not change based on any user input or saved profile).
Clicking the start button still progresses to the next level as before.

requirements.text: Ensure the game state uses the fixed name "Priyanshi" consistently (including when hydrating from saved progress) so downstream screens (bonus/victory/keepsake) cannot display a different name.

quotes: name is Priyanshi fixed no input needed

acceptanceCriteria: After login and hydration from backend progress, the in-game name remains "Priyanshi" (saved name values do not override it).
Victory screen and keepsake card display "Priyanshi" as the name.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components are read-only in this project).
Do not edit immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; add migration.mo only if state schema changes (not expected for this request).
nonGoals: Do not change any other game levels, gameplay mechanics, scoring, animations, or visual assets beyond removing the start screen text input(s) and fixing the name.
